name: wimp-out

effect.scarlet_violet: After this Pokémon is hit by a move, if that move caused this Pokémon's HP to drop below half, it switches out.
effect.the_teal_mask: After this Pokémon is hit by a move, if that move caused this Pokémon's HP to drop below half, it switches out.
effect.the_indigo_disk: After this Pokémon is hit by a move, if that move caused this Pokémon's HP to drop below half, it switches out.
effect.legends_za: After this Pokémon is hit by a move, if that move caused this Pokémon's HP to drop below half, it switches out.

short_effect: This Pokémon automatically switches out when its HP drops below half.
